node.title: Thousands again march in Australian cities against vaccine mandates, pandemic restrictions
node.alt: A sign reading 'My body, your choice? This is an assault!' being held up at a protest.
node.description: Thousands-strong crowds gather in Melbourne and other cities to protest, many holding signs and chanting slogans against vaccine rules.
node.content:
["Thousands of people are again marching in Australian cities to protest against vaccine mandates and government responses to the COVID-19 pandemic.", "In Melbourne, a group of more than 1,000 people gathered outside state parliament before walking down Bourke Street.", "Traffic has been\u00a0blocked off by the protests. Parts of the CBD were already closed for the Melbourne Marathon, which ran on Sunday morning for the first time in two years.", "Many in the crowd were holding signs and flags.", "Chants of \"sack Dan Andrews\" and \"my body, my choice\" are being chanted by the crowd.", "", "
The protests have been running in some form for months.(ABC News)
", "By early Sunday afternoon, the protests were\u00a0peaceful and\u00a0overseen by a large police presence.", "The so-called \"freedom\" protests are loosely organised and contain a range of views and objectives.", "Many people are opposed to mandatory vaccination, while others are against all vaccines.", "Two doses of the safe and effective COVI9-vaccines are required to access most venues and workplaces in Victoria.", "There is a contingent of people who are opposed to government restrictions.", "A small but prominent portion of the protesters has links to far-right extremism\u00a0and unfounded conspiracy theories.", "The demonstrations reached a peak in November, when Victoria's new\u00a0Public Health and Wellbeing Amendment (Pandemic Management) Bill 2021 was before the Parliament.", "That\u00a0bill has now been made law, and Premier Daniel Andrews on Friday made a formal pandemic declaration under the new legislation.", "The latest data from the state health department shows that 92 per cent of Victorians aged 12 and over have had at least two doses\u00a0of a COVID-19 vaccine.", "The majority of people receiving intensive care in Victorian hospitals are unvaccinated.", "
Protests in Queensland before border opens
", "In Queensland, thousands\u00a0gathered in Coolangatta at the Gold Coast, as part of a march protesting mandates.", "The crowd held\u00a0signs opposing vaccines, lockdowns and masks.", "It comes just hours before the reopening of Queensland's border\u00a0to vaccinated people coming from interstate hotspots.", "", "
Why we hear about some COVID-19 variants more than others
"]
